DOC.brief_summary: Anemia is more frequent in patients receiving telaprevir with pegylated-interferon/ribavirin than in those receiving pegylated-interferon/ribavirin alone. The objective was to measure the impact of telaprevir on ribavirin bioavailability and to assess the concomitant renal function.
DOC.criteria: Patients with hepatitis C virus infection Previous nonresponse to pegylatedinterferon/ribavirin therapy Retreatment with pegylatedinterferon/ribavirin and telaprevir Decompensated liver cirrhosis
